entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:29 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 7:30 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Wind: SSE 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Rain beginning after midnight except freezing rain inland and over higher terrain. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 60 gusting to 80 before morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
